name: @biconomy/mee-fusion-demo
description: Complete Biconomy MEE Node Integration with abstract.js SDK and AAVE Protocol demonstrating Fusion Supertransactions

scripts.setup: cp env.example .env && echo 'Environment template copied. Please edit .env with your configuration.'
scripts.infra:status: npm run infra:check:anvil && npm run infra:check:mee
scripts.infra:check:anvil: curl -s -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_blockNumber","params":[],"id":1}' http://localhost:8545 > /dev/null && echo 'Anvil is running on port 8545' || echo 'Anvil is not running on port 8545'
scripts.infra:check:mee: curl -s -f http://localhost:3000/v3/info > /dev/null && echo 'MEE Node is running on port 3000' || echo 'MEE Node is not running on port 3000'
scripts.infra:stop:all: npm run infra:stop:mee && npm run infra:stop:anvil
